"Xiera": "\"Darkness Wall\" is a special skill that affects enemy behaviour."
"By using Darkness Wall, you can <red>attract the enemy's attention<c> and keep them away from softer targets!"

"・Select Darkness Wall with
\u3000<%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight>
・Activate Darkness Wall with
\u3000<%SubPalette>"

"Darkness Wall is a skill that deploys a large wall of Photons in front of you.

Enemies that are nearby when the wall is deployed will be attracted to the wall."
